alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 9:13AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Montana, including the following county, Blaine. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 911 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported minor flooding is occurring. Most of the impacts are along and south of Highway 2, over the southern half of Blaine County. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chinook, Harlem, Fort Belknap, Hays, Cleveland, Zurich, Lloyd, Lodge Pole and Lohman. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
